## Courses at Colorado School of Mines

### Current Courses

**GPGN 436/536 — Geophysical Computing**  
*Fall 2025*

An introduction to computational methods in geophysics, covering programming fundamentals, numerical methods, and their applications to geophysical problems.


**GPGN 438 — Senior Design**  
*Spring 2021 – Spring 2026*

Advisor of student projects in the senior design capstone course. Students work on real-world geophysical problems, applying skills learned throughout their undergraduate education.

### Past Courses

**GPGN 314 — Applied Geophysics (Seismic Section)**  
*Spring 2020 – Spring 2022*

Taught the seismic methods portion of this introductory applied geophysics course, covering the principles and applications of seismic exploration.
